Raw fcs files are available in Zenodo
YFP_Fused_DS01: https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.13318136 
YFP_Fused_DS02: https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.13318501
YFP_Fused_DS03: https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.13319277
Download and unzip all datasets.
Each of the three datasets (DS01â€“03) consists of sevelal folders (ex.T02191218).
Place all these folders in the Zenodo folder.
Subsequently, confirm that the Zenodo folder has the following folders (~50 GB).
